column2: "Asɛm a ofi EWURADZE nkyɛn baa Jeremia hɔ
column3: dɛ
column5: "Hom ntsie ahyɛmu yi ne nsɛm no
column6: na hom nka nkyerɛ Juda mbarimba na Jerusalɛmfo."

column2: "Se hɔn dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Israel Nyankopɔn se nye yi: Mpaa nka nyimpa a onntsie ahyɛmu yi ne nsɛm a"

column2: "mehyɛɛ hom egyanom wɔ da a miyii hɔn Egypt asaase do
column3: fii dadze fononoo no mu
column7: dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ hom nyinara: ɔno na hom bɛyɛ me man
column8: na emi so mayɛ hom Nyankopɔn:"

column2: "ama maama ntam a mekaa kyerɛɛ hom egyanom no etsim
column3: dɛ mebɛma hɔn asaase bi a numfonsu na ewo pem wɔ do
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi. Nna mubuae see dɛ

column2: "Na EWURADZE see me dɛ
column3: Bɔ nsɛm yi nyinara dawur wɔ Juda nkurow mu
column6: Hom ntsie ahyɛmu yi ne nsɛm no

column2: "Na mepaa mu kaa no enyiberdo ara kyerɛɛ hom egyanom wɔ da a miyii hɔn fii Egypt asaase do
column3: dze besi ndɛ

column2: "Naaso woenntsie
column3: eso wɔammbrɛ hɔn asowa adze
column4: na mbom obiara nantseew n’emumuyɛ akoma ne ntsintsiman mu: dɛm ntsi medze ahyɛmu yi ne nsɛm a mehyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ

column2: "Na EWURADZE see me dɛ
column3: Woehu tsirdo apam bi wɔ Juda mbarimba

column2: "Wɔasan ekyir akɔ hɔn nananom a wɔpoow dɛ wobetsie me nsɛm no hɔn emumuyɛ ho; na woekedzi enyame afofor ekyir rokɔsom hɔn: Israelfo na Judafo ato m’ahyɛmu a menye hɔn egyanom dzii no."
"Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column3: Hwɛ
column4: medze mbusu bɛba hɔn do a worunntum mmfi nsa; na wobosu afrɛ me

column2: "Ɔno na Juda nkurow na Jerusalɛmfo bɔkɔ ekosu afrɛ enyame a wɔhyew nduhuam ma hɔn no: naaso wɔnnkɛgye hɔn nkwa koraa wɔ hɔn fona ber no mu."
"Na Juda
column3: mbrɛ wo nkurow hɔn dodow ano si no
column4: mbrɛ w’enyame dodow ano so si ara nye no; na mbrɛ Jerusalɛm abrɔn hɔn dodow ano si no
column5: na hom esisi afɔrmbukyia ama enyitodze no
column6: afɔrmbukyia a wɔhyew do nduhuam ma Baal no a."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mma nnsɔr mma ɔman yi
column3: eso mma mmpegya osu anaa mpaabɔ wɔ hɔn ntsi: osiandɛ mirinntsie hɔn wɔ ber a wobosu afrɛ me wɔ ɔfona ntsi no."

column2: "Ebɛnadze na mo dɔfo wɔ yɛ wɔ me fie
column3: ber a ɔnye dodowara ayɛ ehuhudze yi? Aso mbowa afɔrbɔ botum apa wo mbusu? Ana afei ibotum edzi ehurusi?"

column2: "EWURADZE too wo dzin dɛ
column3: Ngodua ebun ebun a aba pa ama ɔayɛ fɛɛfɛw; ɔdze weɔɔyɛ kɛse ne dede ekua gya wɔ do

column2: "Na dɔm EWURADZE a ɔtsɛɛw wo no
column3: ɔakasa mbusu etsia wo
column4: osian mbusu a Israelmba na Judamba abobɔ ama hɔnho wɔ dɛ wɔahyehyew nduhuam ama Baal dze eyi me ebufuw no ntsi."

column2: "EWURADZE na ɔmaa me ho nyimdzee
column3: na muhunii: nna ekyerɛɛ me hɔn ndzeyɛɛ."

column2: "Na meyɛɛ dɛ eguambaa brɛfo a wɔdze no rokɔ ekumii. Nna minnyim dɛ saa wɔdze ritsia me wɔadwendwen mo ho adwen
column3: dɛ
column4: Hom mma yɛnsɛɛ dua no na no do aba
column5: na hom mma yentwa no mfi atseasefo asaase do

column2: "Naaso
column3: Ao dɔm EWURADZE
column5: na esɔ adwen na akoma hwɛ
column6: ma munhu w’awerdzi wɔ hɔn do: na ɔwo na medze m’asɛm abrɛ wo."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE se wɔ Anathot mbarimba a wɔrohwehwɛ wo nkwa na wɔka dɛ
column3: Mma nnhyɛ nkɔm wɔ EWURADZE dzin mu
column4: ɔno ibowu wɔ hɛn nsaano no ho nye dɛ:"

column2: "mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi
column3: Hwɛ
column4: mebɛtsea hɔn: mberantsɛ no bowuwu wɔ afona ano; ɔkɔm bokuku hɔn mbabanyin na hɔn mbabaa;"

column2: "na nkaa bi nnkɛka ama hɔn: na medze mbusu bɛba Anathot mbarimba do
column3: mekyerɛ hɔn asotwe afe no mu."
